Name: Faux
About the game: Faux is a 2D fast-paced platformer where the player needs to pass all the traps in order to proceed. Journey through the test chambers as you discover new abilities that either enhance, or decrease your performance. FEATURES Controller Support Steam Achievements Exciting and fast-paced gameplay Replayability
